Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO HIGHER EDUCATION
COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO RULES

Title: Requires certain health care providers to disclose the fact that the provider is on probation to current and new patients
Summary: Requires certain health care providers to disclose the fact that the provider is on probation to current and new patients.
LawCode: Amd ยง230, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring certain health care providers to disclose the fact that the provider is on probation to current and new patients
